title: Developing Distance-Aware, and Evident Uncertainty Quantification in Dynamic Physics-Constrained Neural Networks for Robust Bearing Degradation Estimation
summary: Accurate and uncertainty-aware degradation estimation is essential for predictive maintenance in safety-critical systems like rotating machinery with rolling-element bearings. Many existing uncertainty methods lack confidence calibration, are costly to run, are not distance-aware, and fail to generalize under out-of-distribution data.
